forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. South southeast wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 59. South wind 9 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the dawn breaks with a gentle tease of what the day may hold. The air is crisp, with a light chill settling in as the sun has yet to fully unveil itself from the embrace of the horizon. As you step outside, a whisper of clouds meanders across the sky, reflecting the morning's hesitance. Although the forecast hints at possible rain later in the day, the present moment remains a canvas of partly cloudy tranquility, temperatures hovering around a mild 49 degrees. A soft wind brushes against you, playful yet determined, with brisk gusts reminding one of the city's dynamism.

Yet as the hours progress, clouds will gather, gently hinting at the day's potential for rain—an interplay of shades ranging from gray to deeper tones. A few layers—perhaps a light scarf and a stylish jacket—will serve you well, allowing you to navigate both the chill of the morning and the warmth of midday. Today invites a simple stroll through the historic streets or perhaps a cozy corner at a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the soft murmurs of conversations. The world outside is yours to explore, with sights such as the more elusive hints of the Golden Gate Bridge cloaked in low-hanging fog—a reminder of the city's ever-present charm.
